attributes.action: help us we are trapped in morocco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear prime minster
help i am trapped in morocco.
i am contacting to request your help. there are many british people who have purchased apartments on a development called sania plage marina smir morocco. the developer has promised to pay refunds back due to the devlopment running late and some people have been waiting for up to 18 months and still have not had any money back. i and my wife are stuck in morocco because we need our money before we can move. we are getting no help from anybody. we have all been scammed by MRI the lawyers who have links to mri and the developer

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the British Embassy in Morroco and the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
